Workflow.Name: [Operation] Inherit Accountable Team from related Site
Workflow.Description: Inherit Accountable Team (ts_accountableteam) from related Site (msdyn_functionallocation) and enter into newly created operation (ovs_operation) record under ts_opiteam.
